text:
I have developed a new controller that I call a timer controller which 
basically allows all the threats to have point of synchronization during a 
given scenario. This has helped us separate our login phase from the normal 
usage of the application, therefore producing performance numbers which were 
not convoluted.

I'd be happy to contribute the code.

I'll write the bug reported for this code to see if it's interesting.

Marking this as Severity "Enhancement".
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
